From splitting to merging â€” do it all with Karmian and two tools:
PS3Splitter, still at version 1.1.5.1, and the newly introduced PS3Merge, sitting fresh at version 1.0.
Both are for Windows and are generally used for 4GB+-sized files, to you know â€¦ get around FAT32 limitations.
Several backup managers incorporate a means of handling split files; files split using PS3Splitter are compatible with those.
